website_summaries.verdict: Braless shaper with thoughtful design, available in black or beige.
pros: Lifts butt and enhances hips, while reducing inches from waist and abdomen
Constructed with "Powernet," a highly durable weave

Comes in sizes skinny to extra large
Use everyday, postpartum, post C-section, post-liposuction, or under formal wear
